p.k: Poronui: in search of trout in New-Zealand
p.d: In New-Zealand, Jean-Phillip and Alexis stop off at the Poronui lodge. Lying in the heart of a valley, the area is renowned for the size of its trout. Accompanied by experienced guides, the two friends explore the most remote places in the region and immerse themselves in Maori culture. Presented by: Jean-Phillip Tessier, Alexis Pageau. Directed by: Fred Campbell, Hugo Perrin, Étienne Turmel (season 3, Canada, 2018)
